entry.title: "Subsidy fraud" ?
entry.summary: During a recent talk given by Pieter Wuille, he mentioned "subsidy fraud" but it was not clear what the term meant. The speaker discusses various topics related to Bitcoin and blockchain technology in the video linked above. Despite searching for an explanation online, the user who posted this message on a forum was unable to find any information about subsidy fraud. They suggest that if this is a well-known problem, it should be explained somewhere. It is unclear whether or not subsidy fraud is a significant issue in the world of Bitcoin and cryptocurrency, but further research may yield more information.
